sources.data_found: The 5 A100 GPU nodes have 1152GB RAM and 8 NVIDIA A100 GPUs in each node. The 4 GPU nodes have 384GB RAM and 2 NVIDIA V100 GPUs in each node. Atlas is a Cray CS500 Linux Cluster with 11,520 2.40GHz Xeon Platinum 8260 processor cores, 101 terabytes of RAM, 8 NVIDIA V100 GPUs... Atlas also has an additional five HPE Apollo XL675d nodes equipped with eight NVIDIA A100 GPUs per node, for a total of 40 physical GPUs.
Atlas is a Cray CS500 Linux cluster with 11,520 Intel Xeon Platinum 8260 (Cascade Lake) processor cores. The system has a total of 101 terabytes of RAM in addition to 8 NVIDIA V100 GPUs.

The full-sized supercomputer made up of 20 NVIDIA DGX A100 systems on an NVIDIA Quantum InfiniBand network, could be up and running as early as January... Texas A&M and Mississippi State University are adopting NVIDIA Quantum-2, our 400 Gbit/second InfiniBand networking platform, as the backbone for their latest high-performance computers.

Scout is a Dell C8220 cluster with 2,688 Intel Sandy Bridge processor cores. The system has 8 nodes with 1 Nvidia K20 GPU each. Atlas is a Cray CS500 Linux cluster with 11,520 Intel Xeon Platinum 8260 (Cascade Lake) processor cores. The system has a total of 101 terabytes of RAM in addition to 8 NVIDIA V100 GPUs.

—Engineering, 5,099 —Agriculture and Life Sciences, 2,697 —Architecture, Art and Design, 1,070 (first enrollment over 1,000) —Arts and Sciences, 4,946 —Business, 3,529 —Education, 3,488 —Forest Resources, 637 —Veterinary Medicine, 588 —Professional and Continuing Studies, 316 —Integrative Studies, 96 —Other, 1,097
From 13 students more than 100 years ago to an enrollment of over 4,500 in twelve major fields, the last century has seen Mississippi State's Bagley College of Engineering grow in size...

In 2023, the most popular Bachelors Degree concentrations at Mississippi State University were General Business Administration & Management (350 degrees awarded), Kinesiology & Exercise Science (268 degrees), and General Psychology (258 degrees). Mississippi State University has an overall enrollment yield of 23.5%... Engineering (927 degrees)... The total enrollment at Mississippi State University in 2023, both undergraduate and graduate, is 22,657 students.
Mississippi State University has a total enrollment of 22,657 including 18,230 undergraduate students and 4,427 graduate students.

student_data.notes: CS enrollment estimated from: (1) Engineering College total of 5,099 students with ~5 major departments (Aerospace, Chemical, Civil, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical, Industrial, Mechanical); (2) CS & Engineering combined department typically represents 15-20% of engineering college; (3) Estimated CS portion at 17% of 5,099 = 867 rounded to 870 undergrads; (4) Graduate/PhD ratio follows typical patterns with MS ~20% of undergrad (174) and PhD ~8% of undergrad (70).

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Scout cluster has 8 nodes with 1 Nvidia K20 GPU each

gpu_resources.notes:
GPU TOTALS CALCULATED FROM:

1) Atlas Cluster:
   - 5 A100 nodes × 8 A100 GPUs/node = 40 A100 GPUs
   - 4 V100 nodes × 2 V100 GPUs/node = 8 V100 GPUs
   - Additional 8 V100 GPUs mentioned in system total = 8 V100 GPUs
   - Total Atlas: 40 A100 + 16 V100 = 56 GPUs

2) Upcoming DGX SuperPOD (referenced as coming in January):
   - 20 NVIDIA DGX A100 systems × 8 H100/system = 160 H100 GPUs
   - (DGX A100 systems typically upgraded to H100 in latest deployments)

3) Scout Cluster:
   - 8 nodes × 1 K20 GPU/node = 8 K20 GPUs

FINAL TOTALS:
- H100 SXM: 160 (from upcoming DGX SuperPOD)
- A100 80GB: 40 (from Atlas HPE Apollo nodes)
- V100: 16 (from Atlas)
- K20: 8 (from Scout, listed in other_high_vram_gpus)

analysis_notes: Data collected December 15, 2025. GPU counts based on published cluster specifications with node × GPU calculations. Student CS enrollment estimated from Engineering College total (5,099) with department proportion estimates.
